code: import{combineReducers}from"redux";import{persistReducer}from"redux-persist";import storage from"redux-persist/lib/storage";import users from"./userReducer.js";import courses from"./courseReducer.js";import units from"./unitReducer.js";import questions from"./questionReducer.js";var persistConfig={key:"root",storage:storage,whitelist:["users","courses","units","questions"]};var rootReducer=combineReducers({users:users,courses:courses,units:units,questions:questions});var reducers=persistReducer(persistConfig,rootReducer);export default reducers;
